Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Still a great place to eat, I had their prime rib special which came with veggies and a potato. It was massive, the size of my face, as well as tender, juicy, and at a reasonable price (less than 20)!  The clam chowder at the salad bar was also delicious, pretty impressive for a self-service kettle.

Reviews.Author: EJay
Reviews.Content: Do not be fooled by its plain Jane looks. This place has great food  with daily specials that looks pretty solid. The breakfast plates are awesome. The have gaming and the machines are ok. I will definitely be back.

Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Love this place! Very old school feel. Amazing staff and excellent food. The specials are always unique and well thought out.

Reviews.Author: Jet
Reviews.Content: My friends and I have been coming here for years  This is a perfect neighborhood restaurant and bar.  Chose a booth or table.  Extensive menu with at least five daily specials. The lounge area feels like a living room.   I don't know who chooses the muted background music, but it's my era and I love it.  We are often lucky enough to get Kelly as our server.  I'm sure if, by chance, she saw us coming in from the parking lot, that bottle of wine would be waiting at our table.

Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I was surprised when I walked in looks better on the inside then I expected. I love how dark it is inside and the candle lit tables to bad its only like that on the smoking side. The food is just average and the prices are to high for what they serve. I would go back but only if I had a coupon!

Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This place is always so much fun when the piano bar is happening. The service is great and the atmosphere is truly unique. The menu is creative and priced fair. We enjoy bringing our company here because it is an experience that truly is vintage Vegas feeling.

Reviews.Author: Bobby
Reviews.Content: Server Sharon the Best very professional   Breakfast Damm good all staff on top of things. You need to eat here.bar separate

Reviews.Author: ted
Reviews.Content: Love this place. Thank you Maria for making me go! The food is great and the staff, including the owner are even better.

Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: This place is cute in an old-Vegas way. Lots of green decor and old Vegas photos. It's divided into a dining area and bar/gaming area. The staff are friendly and attentive. The menu is fairly extensive and there are daily specials. Mostly American cuisine - various sandwiches and burgers and whatnot. There's also a small soup and salad bar. The prices are reasonable and the portions substantial. My sandwich was a-ok. Edible and tasty enough, but not particularly good. It's the type of food / quality you would most likely expect of a gaming lounge, strip mall establishment. Not worth a special trip IMHO, but good enough if you're in the area.

Reviews.Author: Kari
Reviews.Content: I normally absolutely LOVE this place. I have spent lot of money gambling and eating here. But coming in tonight, having spent money on food and a little on gambling, with the intention of spending more on gambling, and being told  You can't say the F-word,  as in F-U-C-K, after coming in for YEARS and spending money, broke my heart. Sorry guys, I'm an adult. You've lost my money now.

Reviews.Author: Charlotte
Reviews.Content: Went here with a large group of people last night for apps and drinks. Got yelled at by the female bartender for playing the disc box. Selected music is chosen until the graveyard shift begins but there was no sign and she would not reimburse me for swiping my card. Food was good but all customers were older and it is a CALM environment. Do not go here to have FUN!

Reviews.Author: Bart
Reviews.Content: Old school Vegas. Good food, good service. Nice atmoshphere. The salad bar...boring. I hate these salad in a bag places. That is what they offer. Lettuce cut up somewhere else and trucked in in plastic bags. Veggies sliced somewhere else and shipped in in plastic bags or containers. Boring.   Now the good part. I ordered the ribeye. One of the best steaks I have eaten in some time. The steak was flavorfully cooked, juicy, and flavorful. My guest ordered a pasta dish that was not what she wanted. It was too full of wine sauce. We asked the server and they replaced it with my guests second choice from the menu. No Charge even thou we offered to pay for the food. It was not the kitchens fault. It was just not what we expected.   Service couldn't have been better. Wonderful service, wonderful food. Lots of old people. Not a real young peoples place. Keep up the great work!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Veronica
Reviews.Content: I wish I could give Ichabod's more than 5 stars. There are hundreds of pubs in Las Vegas. All pretty much the same, except for Ichabods. The entire staff is incredible. Especially Maria, the bartender. We actually saw her at a different pub and she gave my husband and myself $40 each to play at Ichabods, a place we had never heard of at the time. Boy, was that such a beautiful gift!! They make you feel so at home and cheer for you and give superb service. I've never had bad service and I've been going to this pub regularly for months. The food is absolutely delicious and there is live music! What more could you ask for?!?  As far as pubs go, this place is perfection.

Reviews.Author: Miss
Reviews.Content: I thought this place was one of the best kept secrets until I saw 3 co-workers dining here, too. I don't like eating at old looking places but this place has charm. I've tried and liked their veggie Burger, Philly cheesesteak, Frisco Burger, fries, turtle cheesecake, baked potato, fried mushrooms, fried zucchini, nachos. So yeah, been there a lot. Service is usually good, the Russian gal remembered our drinks. They have a salad bar but it's not big.

Reviews.Author: Anetta
Reviews.Content: Ichabod's keep getting better! I became hooked on the fresh fish then discovered their daily specials! What a deal! AGAIN the service was perfect, they remember me,and  have my drinks ready. ( I love that) They are friendly and never mind my special requests! I gamboled after dinner  not only won more than enough to pay for 5 more dinners, but was entered into a Tuesday drawing with the chance to win $5,500 dollars cash!  I tell everyone I can about Ichabod's it is really the best I have found.

Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: The four of us 'adults' went for a late breakfast.  We had company from Oregon.  Bloody Mary's were in order and YELP! steered us to this place and we were very impressed!  Excellent place for breakfast!  Very old-school Vegas type of joint.  The blueberry pancakes were the bomb!  The place was filled with lots of old gray haired white people.  That alone tells you the food is worth coming back too!  Enjoy this gem!  When you are finished, go walk off your food at 'Habitat For Humanity' across the street.  That is exactly what we did.

Reviews.Author: Suzanne
Reviews.Content: The food is great.  My only complaint is that in a desert with dwindling water resources each patrons is served a glass of ice water along with what ever drink they have ordered in the dining room.  At my table with 5 patrons only one person drank any of the water and the same at other tables around us. Serve water when patrons request it.

Reviews.Author: Jeanine
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this place. We went to go eat and pick up food for our family to go. There was a live band playing that was so fun and my pasta was amazing! Great service and great local spot.

Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: This review is pretty much only a nacho review because I heard that the nachos were the best in the city and lately I have become a bit of a nacho tramp and I'm working my way around the city to find the best batch. The basic rundown: the bar is a typical bar but the restaurant is actually pretty cozy and perfect for hangover Sundays...or Mondays...or Wednesdays, you get the point, it's dark, dimly lit and has lots of booths. It has a very old school feel with pictures of old school Vegas. The server was awesome (minus the Raiders shirt), nice and very attentive.   On to the food, I hate reading too many positive reviews about a place because then it places my expectations too high and all I read was how good Ichabod's nachos are. Well... the reviewers were right, the nachos were pretty good. I didn't want to believe people when they said it was some of the best in the city but it definitely warrants top 5 consideration. Right blend of cheese, chicken, and no overkill on the chips. Sold.

Reviews.Author: damon
Reviews.Content: It seems that this Bar and Grill has been split in two.  There's already a dead on review for the Grill.....and make no mistake,  they really do have AWESOME and cheap hamburgers.  And the instant seating makes everything shiny too.  As for the Bar part.......well.  I heart Ichabod's, but it's atmosphere in the Lounge is a little depressing.  But depression has it's place.  I wouldn't recommend Ichabod's for a swinging group get together....but with Valentine's Day approaching it's time to consider a place to go and wallow in ones tears.  The perfect place to pull up a stool and reflect over a Tom Collins or 5....alone.  Oddly it's decor is cozy , not sad in any way, very green but something a little haunting still seeps in.  Maybe it was built on an Indian burial ground.  In closing.....I would drown my   mean reds  in Ichabod's any day.  But probably not the best choice for a 21st B-Day party.

Reviews.Author: Michele
Reviews.Content: We were invited to play the poker here and we met some amazing and friendly people. Haven't tried the food. Liked the music.

Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Our waitress Jamie goes above and beyond !!! A few months ago I fell in love with a special they had on the menu for lunch. Our waitress took my number and called to let me know when it was on the menu again and not only was I impressed and grateful, I came back and it was just as wonderful as the first time!!! The food here is excellent but the service is over the top!!! Thank you, Jamie!!!!

Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Im not impressed,with what ive heard i dont want to slander too, bad but i have first hand knowledge of how they treat U.S soldiers and so I leave this review ..They will NEVER get my money

Reviews.Author: Dean
Reviews.Content: Excellent and comfy steakhouse feel, tasty and well-portioned meals, and terrific service.  The Katrina sandwich was wonderful with an ample amount of fries.  Our server was helpful and attentive.  Tables were plentiful and very clean.   Definitely somewhere to visit when in the East Las Vegas area.

Reviews.Author: Gregory
Reviews.Content: To modify a page from the Hooter's playbook, Ichabod's is  Delightfully Creepy, Yet Refined.   The inside of the this place is creepy dark, almost to the point of tripping over furniture.  The small Tiffany-esque lamps on the tables and huge, heavy-looking furniture add to the quirky atmosphere.  To top it off they have someone playing a piano to a Casio-style beatbox!  It's a fun spectacle that must be experienced to be appreciated fully,  I had the Neptune wrap for lunch today.  It was quite tasty.  The avocado was fresh and the French fries are coated with something that give them a little extra crunch.  I think the Strawberry Fields salad is on the agenda for my next visit.  I was offered a candied walnut from the salad by my lunch companion and it was sweet, but not disgustingly sugar crusty like your typical candied walnut.  My only real complaint is that they are used to working with a senior citizen clientele here, so service can be a little slow.  However, when we told our server that we were on a time crunch to get back to work on time today she was pleasant and incredibly helpful.    Ichabod's is definitely on my list of favorites when work takes me to the east side.

Reviews.Author: Tiger
Reviews.Content: 3.5 stars, rounded down.  The atmosphere is dim lighting and very relaxed feeling. I enjoyed that.   The food is tasty, however, they do need to learn how to serve a hamburger. When I ordered my chili burger, it came out... well... sort of served bar style? The top bun was cut in half and the bottom bun was not... but... why would you put the burger and chili and toppings on top of BOTH buns, and slop it all over the edge so I can't rearrange the sandwich? I ended up having to eat it open faced with a knife and fork, which is NOT why I ordered a burger.  The waitress was a bit surly and unpleasant, and bordering on neglectful occasionally. She seemed to spend a lot more time focusing on the obnoxious table next to us, who made a lot of noise. I guess the squeaky wheel does get the grease.  I'll go back. It's decent, just not omg amazing.

Reviews.Author: Sariah
Reviews.Content: Great food, awesome service, can't complain about the prices... Overall a welcoming atmosphere definitely a great place to stop by and enjoy your time in. By the way the hot wings are delicious too!!!

Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: My mom and I always stop here if we need a quick bite to eat. We only ever get the San Fran burger ( I think that's what it's called ) and it's delicious. Their salad bar isn't the best and is kinda sad though. The staff is attentive and friendly and you don't have to wait forever to get your food. We will continue to go here as we really enjoy the food and the staff

Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: Had lunch here on 11/28/12.  Walking in you get a feeling of the old Vegas and forget  you are in a Food 4 Less shopping center!   My co-workers had had lunch there twice  recently and loved the food!  The decor was somewhat 70's and 80's with mirrors, big leather booths and chairs and dim lighting- but it fits the place!  There's an old-school steakhouse type of a salad bar that looked fresh and very clean!  They had a list of daily specials in addition to a pretty extensive menu.  I had a grilled chicken sandwich with fries.  The sandwich was so tasty!!!  They also have some awesome ranch dressing!!!  Two of my friends ordered the wet burrito that looked awesome.  Another ordered the soup and salad bar.  She declared the broccoli cheese soup was yummy!    Service was friendly, fast and attentive.  It's a perfect lunch place but I would totally eat dinner if I happened to be on that side of town!

Reviews.Author: No
Reviews.Content: Went in here not expecting what I got. I had to sit at the bar and listen to the bartenders political opinion on  race. Just because I'm white doesn't mean I'm going to agree with you. Cancelled my order a day left. If I go to a bar I expect to have food and/or drinks, not your unsolicited  opinion.

Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: Amazing food, quiet atmosphere, and good times with your friends. That is what ichabods is about. There cold sandwiches are to die for,  and the service there is great. I love going to ichabods with the family.

Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Meh.  Not in a bad way.  The food and atmosphere are decent in a  This is my Dad's favorite restaurant  kind of way.  You won't be wowed by anything but you probably won't get anything bad either - food, service...it's all safe in a bland sort of way.  Glad we had a Groupon.  If we had paid full price I might not have been as satisfied...

Reviews.Author: Shirley
Reviews.Content: Me and my boyfriend used to go there and have so much fun with the Bartender's and the customers but slowly all the good bartenders and customers are gone. Not like it used to be. Anyways they have a new bartender who is very rude and disrespectful. And didn't give a shit at all. They need to get rid of that one for sure. All the good Review.  are from Wayback when they used to have good Bartender. Just being honest.

Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: Went for dinner on Christmas Eve it was a nightmare my server couldn't get anything right and the cooks were worse than she was everyone on duty that evening had a scowl on their face even the stupid manager at the bar with the long dark hair is always looking unhappy the hostess with the Santa hat on look like she was at a funeral I will never go to this restaurant again

Reviews.Author: Donjie
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that a place like this is open 24/7 where when I get off work I'm able to just walk in a bar to be served.  The Gina and Kim helped me out to get food that was recommended to eat.    They also have many poker games that helped me win some cash to pay for food and house drinks.  They play pretty good up beat music.    I like this place because you are always being assisted by the bartender every 5-10 minutes. I think it's because they try their best to have a happy customer.    Will definitely come back to this place.

Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: What a find! I love when friends rave about a small place. This little lounge is in a strip Mall. The atmosphere is great with an old Vegas Vibe. The Salad Bar was great! I happened to be very hungry and I'm glad, because the portions are huge. You definitely get your money's worth! I had the New York Strip Steak sandwich, it was great. It's attached to a bar, but separate, which I like. Definitely coming back.

Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Went there for Dinner Christmas Day and it was delicious! My son had prime rib and I had pork chops and it couldn't have been tastier! The atmosphere was perfect - the piano player was playing and people were dancing. Were were in the lounge side which I had never been in before and it was beautiful!  Lots of people were there, having drinks at the bar and there was lots of socializing between people.  Their Christmas decorating was pretty - just right!   Normally we eat in the dining room, which is great also, but from now on we will be asking to eat in the lounge!

Reviews.Author: Marylouise
Reviews.Content: Another hidden Las Vegas Gem, and I mean  hidden , however, it is worth every minute you search for it.  Lovely, genuine, and seasoned folks run this delightful restaurant/lounge.  Food was delicious and the salad/soup bar well presented.  The split pea soup was perfect, the garlic toast well done and tasty.  We split the Chicken Parm and was more than sufficient for our hearty appetites.  If the crowded madness of the strip is getting to you, get off of it and search for this hidden gem.  It is well worth the time!

Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: We used to visit ichabods at least once a week when you could get the best salad bar in town  for free with an entree.. Then the price went to $2.99, we still came because it was still the best in town.  Then it jumped to $3.99 and we noticed smaller portions and higher menu prices. . So we stopped coming. . After about 6 month or so we stopped last night as I was craving that salad bar.  I ordered the hot turkey $8.99 and my partner had the chicken parm sandwich. We then asked to add the salad bar and was told it was now $6.99 to add the bar to a sandwich. So, no salad bar for us.  You can only get the salad bar for $3.99. If you have an entree or order a special. The chicken parm was delicious,  a true winner.  My turkey, was a tiny scoop of mash and bread with a few turkey pieces. . While good, the portion was Def smaller than ever. . To say the least I think they probably have lost 3 customers for good,  and yes that salad bar was still looking good but, they took the soup away and now you have to order it from the kitchen instead of it being at the salad area.

Reviews.Author: Christie
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised at this restaurant/lounge.  The price, atmosphere and food all work together. You don't leave here feeling as though you were ripped off and  unsatisfied. I would recommend trying this place out. Ichabod's lounge proves that there is more than what meets the eye.

Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE the atmosphere that this place has. We have Been coming here for a very long time. One of my favorite to go to and the food is always delicious.  I can not always say the same for some of the service.  We enjoy sitting in the lounge area where smoking is still available.  Great music and friendly people.  The only downfall to this experience is that we always seem to get the exact same waitress no matter where we sit in lounge, which would be fine if she knew the menu, drinks, and how to actually provide an enjoyable dining experience. I would just like for the Manager/Owner to be aware that some of the employees they have working for them are actually taking away from a wonderful hidden treasure.

Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I love Ichabod's!  The atmosphere is amazing. The food is incredible. The salad bar is out of this world!   The employees are attentive, friendly, and go over and above to provide the most excellent service ever...especially Maria. Check this place out!  You'll love it and will want to return time and time again.

Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: The logo of the Silhouetted headless horsemen with the beer stein is what sets the high standard for me. Ichabod's from the outside gives one the feeling this place can't serve breakfast, can they?  Ichabod's Lounge- as in Ichabod Crane and  The legend of Sleepy Hollow.  Has no other motif of Headless Hessian troopers or anything supernatural other than the welcome mat and the Sign out front. It does however remind me of when I was a kid and it was more of a lounge type restaurant that dominated NY (*like Junior's in Brooklyn.) with it's dark interior, little strands of lighting and random salad bar. (Those were the places that didn't leave standard dinner rolls before the food came out; it was muffins or raisin bread.)  Ichabod's served up a bomb omelet for breakfast. I get the impression the rest of the menu is solid the service was friendly and nice. This is a local spot the waitress and the older proprietors peppered throughout the place all seem to know each other. The Menu is bar food and I would go there before I go to an Ihop or Denny's. The bar portion of the restaurant as previously mentioned is separated by glass and that's cool the joint doesn't reek of old cigarettes.

Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: This review (for the moment) is for the dining side only.  Went in late on a Friday evening to see a bartender friend who I learned was now working at Ichabods.  Unfortunately it was her day off.  Decided to grab a bite to eat at the dining room.    The dining room is nice in a vintage way.  It looks fancy, but is absolutely causal.  No smoke smell at all from the adjoining glassed off bar area.  There is a salad and soup bar.  Everything (including restrooms) was clean.  Prices were reasonable and the service was competent.  I had the open beef sandwich and my dining partner had the beef stroganoff (daily special) and the soup and salad bar.  We were both pleased and based on this visit, plan on returning again for food.  Pros: Good variety on menu Reasonably priced Clean and no smoke smell Generous portions Good service Relaxed atomosphere

Reviews.Author: Alfonso
Reviews.Content: Ichabob's lounge is a great place to eat outside the strip of Vegas. First off, this place is open 24hrs and it offers a salad bar, a bar & lounge with machine poker and a cool cigarette vending machine and play all the great rock n' roll hits!   Occasionally the owner of the place  Francois  hangs out and checks in on customers to see how they are enjoying their food which shows they he really cares. He has also offered Ichabob dollars which can be used towards food or playing the video poker.   Now for the food.. The salad bar is great it's always fresh ingredients and always constantly gets refilled so that it never runs low. I have eaten here a couple times and always get something new. The omelettes are great and they offer a variety of different types and also classics. The pastrami sandwich is delicious its low fat pastrami that doesn't mess with the quality of the taste.   I could keep rambling on about this place, but i won't lol! A little side note this place also offers a fit menu for all those people on diets or counting calories!

Reviews.Author: Mal
Reviews.Content: The staff in here is wonderful. This is a great local spot with decent bar food. I love going in and always running into someone from the neighborhood. My go to is the chicken sandwich with bacon or the chicken philly. It has been a staple in the neighborhood for quite some time, and it's worth a visit!

Reviews.Author: Ayton
Reviews.Content: Young people beware!! It's full of old people and they took forever to cook the food.

Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: So here I am sitting in this place with a military shirt on and somehow I became a bad guy? The customers in this place we're so rude, and the staff during the day did nothing to shut them up, their was some short foreign guy whom I believe is either the owner or manager, and he just let it happen.. he can now rest assured that everyone on my post will know the kind of place he runs,  I will let everyone I serve with  know to black ball this place and to warn  all their friends and families,  I hope that this place is out of business  soon and replaced with a military friendly bar!

Reviews.Author: Eman
Reviews.Content: I had 4 $20 dollar coupons for Ichabods Lounge and it just so happened to be my gf's bday.  So I treated her and some of her family to this place.  I said, get whatever you want!   I ordered the French dip which was a little dry but good thing it came with au jus which was too salty and it was more like a gravy. =\ my gf ordered the petite filet mignon which was so good.  They also had an AYCE salad bar, but it wasn't to extravagant and it looked like they were running out on alot of items.    As for the service, it was good, but not that good.  Our server had little to no personality and was way too sarcastic.  Our food was brought out by the chef himself so that was nice.  Prices are not bad at all. I'll for sure be back to try other stuff on the menu, even if I don't have those coupons.

Reviews.Author: MJ
Reviews.Content: Excellent for AND service. Denise was our waitress this am. I have not had service this wonderful in years! I was raised in a restaurant I know service. The food was excellent as well. This is a hidden gem in my new neighbor. Can't wait to come back.

Reviews.Author: Evelyn
Reviews.Content: Great food with a family atmosphere, great customer service too and low prices as well

Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: One of my favorite places to eat in Las Vegas! The food is amazing and it's one of the last bar/restaurants in Vegas to still have that  Old Vegas  feel. The owner, Francois, came over to our table personally, to make sure everything was satisfactory. Our bartender, Maria, was funny, friendly and very attentive with our drinks. I highly recommend Ichabod's to anyone looking for that  old vegas  feel!

Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: This is a 3.5 star review that will probably become a 4 star review when I return and get something else.  It's a very cool  old Vegas  joint as many note.  Even lunch on a weekday had a nice vibe to it.  It was dark, low key, with nice music playing.  I had the San Francisco sourdough burger, which comes with cheese and mushrooms on parmesan bread.  I added fried onions, as I usually do when fried onions are available.  The bread was great, you could definitely taste the parmesan.  But, it was overly greasy, which got worse when you add the cheese and the burger patty.  The chipotle mayo was very good, had a nice kick to it.  But, annoyingly, I was not given my fried onions with the order.  So, I ate the first half of the burger without them.  They are solid, basically small onion rings.  I recommend them, and hopefully you get them with your meal.  Instead of fries, I tried the potato wedges at the recommendation of the server.  They were good, but not homemade.  I did prefer them to fries, so she was right on in that regard.  Every employee was very friendly.  I'll return and likely try an entrée next time, and I'm sure I'll update my review to 4 stars.  It's a cool joint, we need more of them in Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: We went to Ichabods because I had a coupon and wanted to try something different.  It is located in a shopping center so I was surprised when we walked in and saw that the decor is very old Vegas - low lighting, red tablecloths, candles on the tables.  As mentioned in other reviews, the bar and dining area are separated.  If you have children in your party, you enter the dining room through the door on your left.  The prices were very reasonable (less than $10 per person for breakfast and lunch).  I had the Monterey Chicken Philly with no mushrooms and the dressing on the side.  The roll tasted nice but was large and the chicken did not fill it all.  I guess I am used to seeing the meat spilling out of a philly.  The fries were adequate.  My husband had his standard two eggs, hash browns, and toast.  A plus was the availability of turkey sausage (although there is a small extra charge).  He said it was nice - which is a compliment.  Our waitress, Debbie, was very nice and attentive.  She was busy but still came by to check on us and fill our drinks.  I would return to Ichabods except for one thing - the toddler.  She was a little loud for the atmosphere.  If you do take little ones, keep in mind that Ichabods does not have a children's menu - thus no crayons - so bring something to keep them occupied.  This is certainly not a complaint about the restaurant, just an observation.  Other than that, Ichabods was pleasant and well worth the money.  It is a nice local place.

Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: This place is always amazing & so personable everytime we go whether it's breakfast in the morning(which is ALWAYS amazing) to a hamburger for lunch or prime rib or filet Mignon for dinner(also amazing)...we are never disappointed and always leave feeling full & their rewards program is definitely worth having for as much as we go!! Thank you to the owner and staff of this wonderful restaurant/lounge :)

Reviews.Author: Lalena
Reviews.Content: Experience:  I found this place on YELP, because it's super close to my Grandpa.   Facility: It's located in a casino, which is located in a strip mall, tucked back off the main street. When you walk in, there's a bar/smoking/casino side and a restaurant side. This is nice so the smoke doesn't overpower the dinning room. It's a quiet, dark atmosphere in the dinning room. It has nice booths and some tables and chairs in the middle. They have a nice small salad bar in the back too.   Service: They are a bit slow here sometimes, but depends on the waitress you get. Mostly they seem pretty friendly. I liked the waitress we had today.   Food:  So far the food has been pretty good. The prices are middle ranged, but true have nice sized potions.  This time I ordered off the daily special menu and got the clams linguini.  It was good. Lots of clams, lots of garlic (maybe a tad bit much), and good sized portion. It came with 2 small pieces of very good garlic toast.  My Grandpa got the prime rib. It was a big portion, and he loved it. I took a bite, and it was tender and cooked perfectly for me. The problem is he wanted med-well. It was more med to med-rare.   Overall:  We will definitely be back. It's close and the food is pretty good.

Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: My family always wants to go here, and this place is usually pretty good. However, tonight was pretty bad. Our waittress had absolutely no idea what she was doing. Apps came out with our food, and she came back asking about our orders like 10 minutes after we ordered. She tried taking our meals away before she was finished and even picked up glasses with alcohol still in them.

Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: 5 stars for the delicious food and 3 stars for the slow service.   The ribeye steak I ordered was one of the best I've ever had, it was seasoned and cooked perfectly.  I would have given them 5 stars if the service was better.  They seemed to be short staffed and our waitress had too many customers to serve.

Reviews.Author: Iryne
Reviews.Content: Decided to try Ichabod's one more time--and glad that I did!!! This time around I went for the traditional, classic American fair with no frills, as opposed to last time when I went with my usual, more adventurous dishes. Had a party of 3 and were pleasantly surprised with the food and service this time around! Dinner specials were abundant and portion sizes were incredibly large for the price--salad and soup bar were a welcome change. Soups were incredibly delicious and salads were above average. I ordered a liver special, and my liver came out amazing--one of the best texture and taste/freshness I've tasted in a while. Server was very nice, knowledgeable and helpful. Yay! I'm a fan and will be back. Glad I tried Ichabod's again.

Reviews.Author: stacey
Reviews.Content: This place has a nice old Vegas vibe, the ambience is nice and the light is low; pretty good for a date night or a spot to just unwind after work. Menu is pretty big with a lot of entree dishes, not just bar food. Came here during lunch hour and hardly anyone was there, but service was still kind of slow with the waitress disappearing several times when we tried to get our bill and water to refill.

Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I originally went here in the early evening to have a few cold beers and lose some, money in the video machines. This was my first time here. The decor is the best I have ever seen in a Sports Bar. There are two areas, a bar with dining area and a separate dining area, bar smoking, dining non smoking. The chairs at the tables in the bar area are like someone would see in a gourmet restaurant, in fact if you took a picture of the tabletop and chairs and showed it to people everyone would say it was a picture from a gourmet restaurant. The bartender was friendly and I was chatting with two people sitting next to me. The  next morning I had a urge for Chicken Fried Steak, so Ichabods. Arrived a little after 7am, sat at the bar and ordered. When it arrived the eggs were done properly but very small. The home fries were excellent. The Chicken Fried Steak, the star of the show, was terrible. The meat was very small surrounded with a lot of breading, which was not crunchy and had no flavor. The gravy was tasteless also.It gets worse, every 24/7 sports bars serves this item, price ranges from $4.95 to $7.95. this one was $10.95. This might be the most expensive sports bar Chicken Fried Steak in Vegas. I really wanted to like this place but!!!

Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: When we first arrived, we were almost turned away because we had a large party. After mentioning how disappointed we'd be to take our business to Outback, the hostess quickly found a booth she could clean up to fit us. After a short wait it was ready, we were seated and began to peruse the menu.  The atmosphere is pretty nice, though it's definitely dark. The lounge area is completely blocked off from the restaurant, which allows people to smoke at the bar as well as letting the establishment serve food. While we were there they had a guy playing piano and later he was accompanied by a man playing the flute.   My boyfriend and I ordered the prime rib special, an order of hot wings and the greek town cheese-steak with chicken. The prime rib came with the unlimited soup and salad bar; most of the veggies looked fresh enough, there was a lot of canned things available, about 4 dressings and two soups were out, though one of the soups was pretty low. When the wings were brought out, they seemed a little undercooked. The meat had a chewy texture, not crispy at all- and was juicy to the point of almost pink.   The prime rib was very pink and tender and came with a tasty horseradish sauce. The mashed potatoes were chunky, so that's a plus; means they most likely used real potatoes.   The greek town sandwich was alright, but the chicken breast was a little dry. The fries it came with were good.   Our friends ordered a cheeseburger well-done and it came out pink in the middle. He sent it back and the second one was a little more finished but not cooked all the way through.  The nachos looked good; they were a HUGE portion! Definitely not an appetizer for one or two people, it's geared towards feeding a whole table.   The portions were big and the food was decent but nothing to get supremely worked up over. The atmosphere is definitely the highest point, as it feels like old school Vegas.

Reviews.Author: christopher
Reviews.Content: All I have to say is the foods great.  The place is kitschy and old school which I like. And you are wondering why the 2 stars... Cause service is crappy. I work in the area and go quite a bit and on more than one occasion I sit for 20 min before anyone even takes my order. As I write this I've sat here for 15 min with an empty glass and waiting to pay my check. I get an hour lunch and it takes 50 min to get soup and salad bar and to pay my bill...Wtf is that. Slow as Fuck that's what that is. Think this is the last time I will be here. This is uncalled for.. And not appreciated.

Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: Me and my bf came here for dinner and cocktails and it was seriously the best decision ever. Good food, good cocktails, and the owner stopped by personally to check on us and was so personable. The whole place felt like everybody knew eachother, like family. I also had the best time striking up a conversation with a Mrs Bonnie D while I played video poker :) So much laughter. This place is across town from where we live and we'll totally make the drive again, we had that much fun. Best new bar experience all year. Francois and Bonnie D you guys are ROCK STARS!!!!

Reviews.Author: Julian
Reviews.Content: Interesting little cross-section of old Vegas.  They have live music in the form of one guy on a keyboard playing a few standards and allow enough room in front of him that people can come out and dance to the tunes if they feel so inclined.  This place has a decent menu and a friendly staff, but might not be a place for the 20-30 crowd.  Nice all the same.

Reviews.Author: Gil
Reviews.Content: This has to be one of the funnest places I've been to in a long time. The owner Francois greeted us like we were kings and treated us that way the entire night. The staff was nothing less than amazing. The food was fantastic and the entertainment was even better. My whole family enjoy the evening.

Reviews.Author: Shantel
Reviews.Content: Been wanting to try this place for awhile now and I am definitely glad I did. My husband and I chose to finally go out for date night and we had an amazing time. Our bartender KimT was so sweet and friendly! Great food, good drinks, friendly faces, and excellent service... We'll definitely be back again!

Reviews.Author: Hylton
Reviews.Content: Vegas institution.. great atmosphere.. Have been here many times and always fun. Food is good and staff are friendly and when there is live music it is a really fun place. Often just sit at the bar and eat. Great place for locals with a very diverse crowd..bar staff very friendly!

Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I love Ichabods for late night cravings, they got a great open face turkey sandwich with mashed potatoes, gravy, cranberry, etc... I have not had any bad food there on grave, and the best part is that once you order your food is usually out to you in between 5 and 10 minutes depending of course on how many people are there and what you ordered. Would recommend anyone to stop in for a bite, foods great, staff is great, atmosphere is great. all around great place.

Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: Great place to eat, drink and gamble. The food was amazing and the service was excellent. I loved everything I ordered but I would have to say my favorite was the haddock. We ate at here 4 times on our 5 day stay in Vegas.  Highly recommended!  You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Author: Truly
Reviews.Content: not quite WHOOHOOO as good as it gets, but close!  A solid 4.5 from this patron.  Went there for breakfast, and LOVE the build your own omelette option for a reasonable price of like $8 for 5 items to build it with of your choice.  I took my adult son and his friend, and have to mention, these boys can EAT and left with doggie bags to take home.  They're also broad shouldered, and sitting in a booth with one of them was a tight fit, but would be PERFECT for date night if you wanna be cozy!  LOVED the ambiance and soft lighting.  Some places similar don't have directional lighting over the tables, but this place does, and it's nice to be able to see your food and read the menu, but also have an old Vegas type  style  to the place.  We checked out the salad bar for the lunch menu, and will be going back to try that next because everything looked pretty good.  Service was spot on, and timely.  I didn't go over to the bar side because I can't stand cigarette smoke, so this HAS to be mentioned too...the restaurant portion is completely separate from the bar area, and  glassed in  so you can see the bar area, but not SMELL it...and THAT is something I truly appreciate!!  You for sure forget your in a shopping center with Food4Less and Planned Parenthood right down the way next to Planet Fitness.  They have assigned parking spots for their customers, which is nice too!  Go enjoy a nice meal, then get a tan or your nails done or pick up a pack of smokes followed by some grocery shopping all within the same corner of the parking area...CONVENIENT!  Especially since I live within walking distance!  I'll be going back for SURE!

Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: We eat at Ichabod's quite a bit.  The food is good and at a reasonable price.  The service is superb, the live entertainment during the evening hours is an old Vegas treat.  They have a nice little all-you-can-eat soup & salad bar as an add-on to any meal, and the drinks are well made - though they are a little weak.  The food is great, and we've ordered most everything on the menu at one time or another...the Steak Caesar Salad is exceptional, and they have a lot of great daily specials.    The best part about this place is that it is smoker friendly.  The non-smoking side is completely separated with glass and separate ventilation, but the bar area is nice, smoker-friendly, with white tablecloths, comfortable chairs, and charming appeal.

Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Let me start off by saying what a gem this place is. We went to Ichobods for a girls night out and we had food and drinks. The food was wonderful try the wings! Chris the grave bartender was so great. We will be back.

Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I love coming here after work.  The staff is amazing, and the food can't be beat.    The real reason to update my review is that I started playing Video Poker on occasion and their Royal starts at $1500 on the progressive for quarters.  I am used to casinos where it starts at $1000, or is capped at $1199.  Sometimes I've played and they have a great paytable, but lets face it, we're all here for the Royal.  I hit the Royal this morning, and it sure is a great feeling getting much more than the casino!  Thanks to the great staff and excellent food, I won some money!

Reviews.Author: Mae
Reviews.Content: Greatest place to find good food, and great gamimg....but the best thing ever is the service and drinks you get from  bartender Kim, greatest feeling to go into a place and always be greeted with such a great smile!!

Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: What can I say? I'm impressed. Walked into this little joint after years of driving right by it hundreds of times. You walk in and automatically feel as if you're in a different era when the mob still ran Las Vegas. Dark green walls and dim lighting makes this place feel very relaxing.  You walk in and have the choice of either sitting in the gaming area or the actual dining area. We came in for a late breakfast, wanting to try something different we decided to give Ichabod's a chance and we're glad we did. I decided to go with the Denver omelette and it was amazing! Totally loved it, I don't think I've had a better tasting omelette anywhere else. The waitress was very nice and on top of everything, she regularly stopped by to make sure everything was good.   I am curious about the rest of the menu so I will definitely be returning to explore it, I'm pretty sure with whatever I order I won't be disappointed. Good food and great service!

Reviews.Author: Mariel
Reviews.Content: I was in town visiting my aunt this week and she took me to eat at this restaurant. The food was good, but I must say, the service was great! Our server was on top of it!  She was super sweet and was helpful when I asked her about the menu. This is the reason I'm writing this review! I work in the service industry and I know it could be difficult. I believe her name was Erin. I hope I'm not wrong! I just felt the need to send her some love. Thanks Erin for being such a great server! I hope you see this! :)

Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Great local spot, drink, eat and gamble, you can't go wrong. Plus Kims my favorite bar maid in the land.

Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: The food was good and the portions were nice sized. I definitely will come again to try lunch or dinner. Interested to see the live music that they say they have nightly. This place definitely has the  old Las Vegas  charm! Not many places have table clothes that they change out after every table leaves so I am very impressed with the detail they have here!!!

Reviews.Author: Shana
Reviews.Content: The entire staff is genuinely friendly, not that fake server smile you get sometimes. There is nothing fake about the hospitality here. The food was out of sight! Best burger I've had in ages. We met the manager who was über cool. Great music, phenomenal food and a great mix of folks. Did I mention that they are open 24 hours? Wowzer!! If you are a local or just visiting this is a must stop on your agenda.

Reviews.Author: MB
Reviews.Content: An old-world dinner service with lounge entertainment.  The food is not bad. I had the ham special and my mother had the prime rib--both acceptable for the money!  This is older Vegas and it shows--in a good way.

Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: Good atmosphere,good food in a cozy restaurant , they have a cute little salad bar , I ordered New York strip with a side of coconut shrimp it's just amazing and the steak is tender and juicy , definitely were coming back

Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: Icabod's is a las Vegas institution. Good food, great staff.

Reviews.Author: Lea
Reviews.Content: BOOM!!  I've lived in this neighborhood for five years, passed Ichabod's thousands of times, and never until today made it inside.  I am five years late.  This place is my new favorite restaurant, bar, hangout.  Super clean, great bar ambiance, and the kind of friendly waitresses that you remember from the 'old days' but can never find anymore (Julie was A++). Our Bloody Caesars were out in a flash and absolutely yummy; the food that followed was surprisingly fast, hot, and tasty.   *Happy note for other Horrible Smokers : On the bar/lounge side, there are actual ashtrays on the actual tables, and nobody will give you stink-eye when you light up.

Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: I was ravenous for a juicy burger. The burger was pink and juicy with delicious mushrooms, The french fries were less awesome, but I am not much of a fry girl. Tho, now I want to be one, cause it just sounds cool -  fry girl . Someone else described it as having the  old Vegas  feel. She's right. I've been here since '88 and I'm about to be 50, so I too appreciate  old Vegas  or was that being old in Vegas. They even have a salad bar that you can add onto your meal. There were many specials and a really nice menu. I appreciated that we were not rushed out as our party needed time to talk. I noticed other parties lingering at their tables as well. I forget about Ichabod's until someone suggests it. I will try to remember it more often.

Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, food and atmosphere! This is a old style supper club. I have been a fan of this place for 4 years. Nightly live entertainment, fresh salad bar with 2 homemade soups daily and great service. They are located on the east side and are open 24 hrs. The entertainment this past friday night was a piano player and it was very pleasant to enjoy a nice meal while enjoying some entertainment.

Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: This is my favorite bar. I've been coming here for years. Chris is always nice and makes great Bloody Mary's. I always get the shrimp cocktail and lemon pepper wings. Yum!

Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: I give this bar/restaurant a solid 5 stars, because it is definitely as good as it gets if you are a hungry smoker living in Las Vegas!  You can smoke, drink, dine and gamble in the bar area, which is separated from their regular dining room.  The patrons and staff are a cross-section of young and old, but everyone is very friendly.   The Saturday night we were there, they even had a piano player serenading us while we enjoyed our well-prepared entrees of grilled pork chops (me) and NY Steak (him). The piano player even takes requests!   Service was friendly, albeit a tad slow, but it was a full house and our server was also training someone, so we cut her some slack.   I felt like I was in one of those wonderful supper clubs you see in movies from the 60's, where people gather to enjoy good food, good music and a little tobacco throughout the evening.  Ahhh, the good ol' days!  Ichabod's is now at the top of my list of dining establishments in Las Vegas that accommodate smokers AND has terrific food.  After reading the other reviews here, I can't wait to go back and try their nachos as I am a self-proclaimed  Nacho Slut !   Thank you for doing it right, Ichabods Lounge!

Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: The place is not bad if you like not to be served! Our waitress was MIA for 97% of our time there.  It was so hard to get her attention!  Oh wait I couldn't she was NEVER there. Getting the check took forever.   So anyway about the food. Food was good not bad for just having burgers and fries. I had the philly onion soup sandwich, mom had the seafood wrap, hubby had the frisco burger, nephew had the bacon swiss burger and neice had the slidders. We all loved the food but all hated the service.   The place was a little dim but clean and not bad looking if you like old school italian restaurants. The other bad part was they were vacuuming while we were eating. Hello do that when No one is there!!!

Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: right around the corner from my house, I could stumble home if needed be. Food for a bar, a cut above, not a huge cut, but I have went there just for food actually... Gaming, but I don't gamble, smoking friendly with that crazy new smoke plexi cage they built, cheap drinks too. I would dare say its a trifecta!

Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: I love this place! the customer service is incredible. Little Kim was the best gaming bartender ive came across in vegas. I play a lot and she took care of me when I was playing and had some great food along with my drinks

Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Food was average waitress was good bartender skipped all rock music I played on the jukebox so if a bar doesn't play rock music they shouldn't have it on the jukebox she skipped at the straight-up club music

Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: Wow! I've been wanting to come here for awhile now. Finally made it!  It's a bar on one side and glassed off non-smoking restaurant on the other. I think it's rather upscale and downright elegant. But the prices and the food are beyond reasonable for what you get. I had the beef and cheddar sandwich, which is an all-time favorite of mine. They have set the bar very high with this one. The sourdough was cheesy and crunchy with every bite. The beef...oh my, the beef! It was consistent. Juicy and oh so good! They must dip in au jus. The fries were nice and crispy to the last one. Even the pickles were awesome! Had to try the limonchello mascapone cake for dessert. Simply delish! Surprisingly light and refreshing. My server, Tori, was terrific and attentive. I will so be back...and soon!

Reviews.Author: Glen
Reviews.Content: I've only started going here recently to play in a bar poker league and I've been very impressed so far, The only negative I've found is it doesn't have a selection of beers on draft/tap and serves only bottles which is a shame but it's open 24hrs and has many screens to show all sports games while you relax and enjoy their food which has been excellent so far from what I've seen and tasted! Also the waitress and bar servers are brilliant and make sure your never left waiting for refills or anything you need!

Reviews.Author: Dr. Terry
Reviews.Content: I love this place and go often - HOWEVER - called today to get info and Trish answered the phone and was totally rude to me.  One thing like that can undo all the hard work that has been put into making this place what it is.

Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Ichabod's is great place to eat or drink.  Seems that over the years i have done a lot more eating then drinking.  Home to some of the most comfortable booths in Vegas.  They are nice to sit in and take in the sights of the many patrons.  The green and mahogany creates a soothing ambiance.  The food is awesome and the servers are friendly.  Chose from a burger, wrap, sandwich or one of the best chicken caesar salads in town.  Be sure to ask for extra garlic bread.  The bar scene picks up as the night goes on.  The graveyard bartenders are hip and run a clean, happy place.

Reviews.Author: Fallon
Reviews.Content: What can I say about this place... Husband and I wanted to try something new so we decided to come here. Atmosphere was really chill and got to sit immediately at the bar for some drinks, gambling and of course food. The bar tender came up asked us what we were having to drink and then started playing a little poker. And this is where it started to go down south. We were ignored so bad I started to feel like that dead couple in the movie Beetle Juice lol. We obviously didn't bring our book for the dead! There was no eye contact, not even a gesture got their attention. Finally a lady took our order and then it was back to being ghostly. At this point I was a little buzzed and noticed a lady was chasing the bar tenders around too and nothing would get their attention, so I came to the conclusion she was dead too lol. Over all food was pretty good just HORRENDOUS service.  Will we be Coming back here? Probably not but if we ever do I'll make sure to bring the chalk !

Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: Ichabod's lounge is a Las Vegas locals institution. Great food, great gaming and entertainment that does not disappoint. Whether you want to get a quick meal at the bar or have a wonderful dinner with friends and loved ones, Ichabod's is the place to go. The ambiance is great and the staff are friendly and inviting. I would recommend Ichabod's wholeheartedly for a night out and a fantastic meal.

Reviews.Author: Felipe
Reviews.Content: Great service. Good food. Excellent promotional cash drawings. Open bar. Smoking/non smoking section. Just like old style Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I came here for lunch the other day and I was so pleasantly surprised. I was unsure of the vibe and theme they wanted to give off, but after my visit I'd say it's a diner with better food and a in a classier hangout spot for the older crowd.   It was cute hearing the patrons and servers talking like friends. You can tell the customers are repeat customers who come often aka regulars.  I had a California club with potato wedges and a cup of Manhattan clam chowder. My friend only got a side of fries because she wasn't hungry and it totaled about $15. I thought it was a lot of food and the quality of the food was surprisingly really good. Those were the best potato wedges I've ever had in my life! The club had buttered bread that was toasted and I thought it was a nice touch.  The staff was really nice and the restaurant was really clean. The food came out slower than one might be used to, but not slow. & I didn't care because the food was good. They have a huge menu with pastas, fish dishes, steaks, and the typical breakfast stuff like omelettes and pancakes.  My only complaint about the place has to be the smell. It smells of cigarettes and something off putting. We sat on the side away from the bar but it still smelled. It's probably just because it's old.  I keep thinking this isn't a four star spot but once I weigh out the positives I can't rate it lower.

Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: Ate there twice this week; Friday night and Sunday morning. Both meals were very good. I liked the salad bar and grilled orange roughy with a glass of chardonnay. Sunday I had a custom omelet with hash browns. Service was prompt and friendly.  I can't believe I've lived in Vegas for 25 years and never visited here! It's very popular, despite the 80's décor! It's a charming neighborhood hangout, and one of the few independent bar/restaurants that's not owned by PT's or Station Casinos, so enjoy it!

Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: Went there the Saturday night 12/17. Crowd was minimal. Good vibe going on at this piano bar. Food was good (not fab, but good). Drinks were generous. Older crowd, but that's to be expected at a piano bar venue.

Reviews.Author: Antonio
Reviews.Content: I hesitate this review because I don't want anyone else showing up and taking my spot at Ichabods. But it's too awesome of a place not to acknowledge. Absolutely the best bar in town. Awesome food, spectacular service and just good people.Huge thanks to Maria, the bartender, who introduced us to this awesome spot! And we love showing up on all of her shifts!

Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: This place is fantastic!  The gaming promos are great, they are one of the few places in town that still have a bonus wheel for 4 of a kind.  I love the live entertainment also!  It is a great place with down to earth bartenders who know and treat all their regulars very well. Excellent place for date night with great daily food specials.

Reviews.Author: Ms
Reviews.Content: A special little place with a warm neighborhood feel. The owner cruises through,  adding a personal touch. Great inclusive menu (Im vegetarian) and serves the best breakfast in town. If you don't see what you want or the way you want. ..ask for it!

Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: This review is way overdue! I love this restaurant, their service is excellent and is a model that should be used everywhere. We are a small group of 3-4 who eat every Tuesday night after our class. The employees have ALL gone out of their way to accommodate our needs. We are welcomed like family and they know what we like to order. They have offered split salads, they make sure our different dietary requirements are met, and even our special occasions are acknowledged like birthdays. We are in love with the hot spinach salad and salmon! We miss the pizza fries, we have ordered eggs and potatoes and it has all been delicious.  We thank the twins who started serving us but no longer work on Tuesdays, Shannon is our regular server and makes sure we are happy. Frankie sometimes serves us when we arrive in between shifts, Juan comes out of the kitchen  and serves and cooks for us, Kim starts us with drinks, and Chris the night bartender always walks us outside to make sure we get into our cars safely. This is all great, and they go above and beyond and we truly appreciate all of you!  The restaurant is located on the eastside of the Strip in a shopping center. Once you enter you are brought into an old world style of Las Vegas. The great difference, a SMOKE FREE GLASS ENCLOSED ROOM! (This is how we found Ichabods) I have asthma so it makes a difference. There is live music , and old photographs that are fun to look at. You can sit up at the bar or enjoy the comfy seating they have throughout the restaurant, me I stay in that glass room!  I cannot say enough about the great service and I will have to  dine during the day or earlier in the evening to try more food. I love this restaurant!

Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I went there for lunch.  Had the chicken fingers (only 4 per order) and a coke.  The bill was just under $14.  You'd think I had a steak for that price.  The food wasnt bad but the price was a total rip off for just 4 chicken fingers.  Somebody has to tell them that their $10 fingers are on the appetizer side of the menu.  Totally overpriced.

Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: What a great old time Vegas establishment! I had the Cobb salad and it was beautiful. I failed to take a picture but it will not fail you.  Service is spectacular!!

Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: Good food at a decent price. It's convenient since it's around the corner from our home. You can even order take out which is great for our lazy not wanting to cook nights. Eating there is hit or miss on service sometimes. I do like the live entertainment while eating though. I usually get the pork chops with salad bar. The salad bar used to be included but they started charging a couple years ago. I like the homemade soups and being able to make the salad the way a like. It's like a mini Sizzler salad bar. Nothing to write home about but not bad. My husband usually gets the spaghetti and meatballs which he really likes. I also really like the club melt sandwich. I always order that for takeout. The place itself has an old Vegas vibe. It appears to try to be fine dining but in reality is just a piano bar with decent food.

Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Ichabod's is a great lounge tucked away inside an enormous shopping center.  You really have to use lounge when described this place because upon walking inside the bar is completely separated for the smokers and gamblers from the restaurant.  The restaurant is top notch in decor and offer a wide array of menu selections for a lounge.  I would compare it to a small... off-strip version of the peppermill.

Reviews.Author: Nadalie
Reviews.Content: Always luv the food and our Prime Rib was excellent tonight. Our Bartender was Trisha great service. See you soon!

Reviews.Author: Amira
Reviews.Content: I went there to meet up with friends for a late night drink. Loved the friendly vibe and romantic setting, the smell not so... What I'm giving 5 stars for was the service. I ordered calamari and it came with cheese sprinkled on which was a surprise to me. I don't do dairy, So, they brought 2 extra dishes to make it up for it! And they only charged for 1 glass of wine though I ordered 2. Incredible! Though the food there is not the type of food I eat, I'll go back for another drink and service!!!  Recommend!

Reviews.Author: Jacqueline
Reviews.Content: My grandparents are locals at this spot. I always come here when I'm in town! Last night I had the lemon pepper chicken and let me tell you, it was very delicious! I really like how there is a different section for smokers and non smokers, and the ambiance is also very inviting. They have live music and that really gives it that old school feel.

Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Great food 24 hours.. A very diverse menu.   I recommend the Club Melt.   This is pretty much a typical vegas bar otherwise.  Machines, Separate dining area, and friendly bartenders.  When I lived closer to this place, it was one of my regular stops.

Reviews.Author: Jana
Reviews.Content: This place is pretty aaammmmazzzing!! I'm not say that cuz I work there I'm saying it cuz it's the truth!! If I knew about this gem of a place long time ago I wouldve definitely made it a place as my go to place with friends and family that came out of town. It's definitely old Vegas in modern ways! Love working there love the food love the atmosphere love the people all in all love Ichabods!!!

Reviews.Author: Stefany
Reviews.Content: Vegas has plenty of these places: half bar, half dining room, solid food, attentive service. The menu here has a seafood emphasis, with steamed mussels, seafood salad, and several specials (salmon, fish and chips, roughy) in addition to the usual apps, sandwiches, burgers, etc.   The hype about the salad bar brought me in (available 10am-10pm?), but I ordered gyro salad instead, along with the soup of the day. Food was hot and fresh, especially the produce. The salad dressing and soup tasted like they were made in house, but the gyro meat seemed prepackaged. I'd try a different salad here in the future.  Dining room is going for an upscale vibe with dim lighting, table cloths, and flowers on each table. You can also order from the bar side, which has plenty of TV screens to watch a game. Bar area also has a piano, with live music and special events.

Reviews.Author: Dara
Reviews.Content: This place is great!! The staff is amazing so nice and friendly they know everyone by name and what you like to drink! Food is amazballz! And the machines are super fun!

Reviews.Author: MissRachel
Reviews.Content: Atmosphere is great and the food is even better !!! On the weekends there is live lounge music which always gets the place poppin' !! I have eaten here several Times and the food is always a delight !! You can't go wrong with one of their daily specials and the philly is a good lunch option my BF always gets chicken fingers every time and they never fail !!!

Reviews.Author: Esteban
Reviews.Content: Best wings in town. Great food, great friendly staff and pretty chill place. I like it.

Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I used a groupon today for this place.  I was unimpressed; the food seemed good, but the service sucked.  We rarely saw our server.  My husband and my sign of a crappy serve place is when his glass is empty.  His glass was empty for a while.  I had to give our credit card to another person because we sat there with our check for ten minutes and our server was no where in site.  AND the place was not busy.  At most, there was six other tables in the dinning area that were occupied.  Not interested in returning.  Rather go to a place that has better service!

Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: On the less fun side of the Groupon experience was Ichabod's Lounge.  My gf and I shared an appetizer and two specials.  The appetizer was a clam steamer which was served in a large pot with two small cuts of garlic bread.  The clams were indeed super tasty and were plentiful to boot!  I thought,  This is gonna be great if the remainder of the food was as tasty and they gave you as much!   Unfortunately, the specials really let me down.  The pastrami sandwich was salty, salty, salty.  The ribettes were super super tender, but lacked any flavor in the meat.  It's as if they boiled them and slathered some bbq sauce on it.  Yech!  Didn't have a as big of a problem with service as many of the Yelpers have noted, but she did disappear for a period of time when my gf's drink was empty and again when we wanted the check.  I'm not inclined to come back.

Reviews.Author: Tanner
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a quiet place to hang out and have some food and drinks, this is your spot. They have a full gaming bar with great food. There is also live music and dancing. The scene has a more old school feel with a relaxed vibe. I've had multiple items on their menu and can say that I've never been unhappy with any of my choices. Try it out once and I'm sure you'll want to go back.

Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Ichabod's is my favorite!! The service is always superb. Aaron & Juan are the amazing and make everything taste so delicious. I always come in on the late shift and Chris and Rob are the best bartenders. They make the best drinks & are wonderful!

Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The food is great, and Lani the bartender was phenomenal. A class act all the way around

Reviews.Author: D.
Reviews.Content: first time here I order the chicken and portobello mushroom pasta pasta perfectly done chicken and mushroom succulent will definitely be back to try something different off the menu

Reviews.Author: Sandi
Reviews.Content: This is a great place . The servers are very accommodating and make you feel very welcome. The food is excellent and will make adjustments to the menu. Next time I go I will take pictures as you need to see the presentation.

Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: Hubby and I stopped in yesterday for a light lunch and a visit with our favorite waitress Julie! We sat in a quiet, comfortable booth on the bar side which was very nice. Hubby had the clam chowder bowl, creamy and tasty. I had the spinach salad, no skimping on the spinach and loved the hot bacon dressing as well as the garlic toast. A satisfying and enjoyable lunch.

Reviews.Author: Andrey
Reviews.Content: This place has amazing music, generous cocktail and delicious food. I came on a Sunday when no other place was playing jazz and was delighted to find an actual jazz group playing. Found out that they have music every night. Please come here to support jazz music.

Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: Cool place. I was invited to this place recommended by a friend and I ended liking the place a lot. The food was really good and I enjoyed the other people who were there. I had a really fun time.

Reviews.Author: Wilmer
Reviews.Content: Two bar tenders behind the bar not so much as a hello when we walked in. Sat for 5 mins and nothing. Yeah fuck that we left

Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: As fun as the Strip is for out-of-towners, it's incredibly frustrating for locals: a traffic nightmare of epic proportions, and assuming you can actually get somewhere and park, you still have to negotiate swarms of tourists everywhere you turn.  Most of the time, it's just not worth it if all you want is a quick, no-fuss meal in a quiet spot.  That's where Ichabod's comes in.  Located in a kind of blah strip mall, Ichabod's doesn't look like much from the outside.  Actually, it doesn't look like much from the inside, either - it's quite dark, with strips of Xmas lights running around the walls, and green plants spilling out of boxes atop the dividers between booths (I guess they must be fake, since sunlight rarely penetrates Ichabod's).  It's usually slow, and the servers don't seem all that enthusiastic, and are sometimes hard to find.  The food makes up for the depressing ambience, though.  The Bloody Marys are excellent, and I'm told that their soups are great as well.  The menu is pretty casual, diner-type stuff - lots of sandwiches and salads.  Their wraps are the specialty, and definitely worth trying, especially the chicken caesar wrap and the Neptune wrap.  Packed with meats and veggies wrapped inside spinach- or tomato-flavored wraps, they're huge and tasty.  There's some kind of salad bar there, too, but I've always been afraid of its janky appearance (though that's kind of an Ichabod's theme).  This is by no means a hip or trendy place, and if you see other diners at all, they'll be older couples and families.  But if you're tired of the touristy throngs and just want to go someplace where you can walk right in and be seated (and not pay $12 for a burger), turn to the dark side and try Ichabod's.

Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: What a Great Place to go out and eat and enjoy your company.  5 of us had dinner in the Lounge area while the Piano Player played great music.  We had the Calamari for an appetizer, it was wonderful.  The Entrees we had were Tortilla Crusted Tilapia, Filet and Shrimp, Shrimp Platter, Fish and Chips, a Prime Rib Meal and a Brownie and Ice Cream Dessert shared by all.  All dinners were delicious and the service was great.    All meals include a Salad and Soup Bar.  5 Dinners, an appetizer and several cocktails and our price was $129.00.

Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: Hot roast beef sandwich, like they did in the goods ole' days. Bloody Marys that are awesome. Fresh, dark gravy, home made bread and mashed potatoes. Amazing!

Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Great food. Fantastic entertainment.  Lucrative and aggressive gaming promotions. Old school service and feel.   LOVED IT.

Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: The best part about this place?  Their super yummy seafood salad.  The worst part?  Their AWFUL service.  Ichabod's is near my work so I have been here several times for lunch and every time we've had bad service.  We almost always have to wave someone down to get a refill on our water, and getting the check can sometimes take 20 minutes.  If you have an hour lunch... you can expect to use the whole hour, and you might even be late.    Come on, Ichabod's... get your act together.  Your food's pretty decent and you could have a good lunch crowd if your service didn't suck.
